channel.title: Xp Help
channel.description:
Hey guyys... I'ts me.. again.
now i need help with my stats, i recently changed them to 135, and the exp for 135 went to 48m so when u hit 48m exp u get 135, i wanna make the 48m to 200m, can any1 help?
